text: Iurie Bulat (born ) is a Moldovan male weightlifter, competing in the 85 kg category and representing Moldova at international competitions. He competed at world championships, including at the 2015 World Weightlifting Championships. In 2015 the International Weightlifting Federation (IWF) has suspended Bulat for anti-doping rule violation, after he returned a positive sample for anabolic agents. ==Major results== {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! rowspan=2 width=40|Year ! rowspan=2 width=250|Venue ! rowspan=2 width=60|Weight !colspan=4| Snatch (kg) !colspan=4| Clean & Jerk (kg) !rowspan=2 width=40| Total !rowspan=2 width=40| Rank |- ! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank!! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank |- ! colspan=13|World Championships |- |2015 || align=left| Houston, United States|| 85 kg ||165|| ~~172~~ || ~~176~~ ||DSQ||175||185|| ~~190~~ ||DSQ||0||DSQ |} ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Moldovan male weightlifters Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Doping cases in weightlifting Category:Moldovan sportspeople in doping cases
title: Iurie Bulat
